fileInputs.name: Seed ROIs
fileInputs.description: Tab separated file containing list of seed coordinates (annotated)

appArgs.name: Sector
appArgs.description: Choose a reference sector (VBM, VBP, or TA)

appArgs.name: Radius (in mm)r
appArgs.description: Seed ROI radius. Recommend 6 mm for functional MACM, or 4 mm for structural MACM

appArgs.name: Coordinate Space
appArgs.description: Specify the format of the input foci data

appArgs.name: Mask Size
appArgs.description: Specify more conservative (smaller) or less conservative (dilated by 2mm) masks
